page.title: 06Lee Schofield's Diary (cont)
page.content: {12:00 dinner.}We have these special cards and we mark off the things we have done in the morning. {At 1:00pm,}afternoon school begins with story.The story we are reading at the moment{is,"The Signposters",by {Helen Cresswell.}After story we get our things out and carry on with our work.At{2:00pm}we go out and we can buy sweets from the{school shop. I am one of the{sales people.}When we come in we carry on with our work. The infants go home at{3:00pm and we go home at about{3:30pm. At home I have my tea and then I go out to play. I come in at about{ {8:20pm.}Then I get ready for bed .Then I watch t.v.
